definition: strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort

sentences.english: Those who are strong, Yin and Yang vulnerability.
The resolution and toughness shown in him was valuable.
sentences.chinese: 那表現出的那種堅毅，剛強，是難人可貴的。

sentences.english: Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid or discouraged.
sentences.chinese: 你當剛強壯膽，不要懼怕，也不要驚惶。

sentences.english: Inclined to resoluteness but not to learning, boastfulness would be the failure.
sentences.chinese: 剛強，卻不喜歡學習，其弊乃狂妄。

sentences.english: It is honest and frank doughty, think of says the disposition of what.
sentences.chinese: 是耿直剛強，想到什麼說什麼的性格。

sentences.english: The foundation for raising up a strong new generation is to manage a happy marriage.
sentences.chinese: 興起剛強的新世代之基礎，在於經營一個美滿的婚姻。

sentences.english: In the Middle Ages, men wore them to symbolise their courage and virility.
sentences.chinese: 中世紀，男人們佩戴鑽石，作爲勇敢和剛強的象徵。

sentences.english: David also said to Solomon his son, 'Be strong and courageous, and do the work.
sentences.chinese: 大衛又對他兒子所羅門說，你當剛強壯膽去行。

sentences.english: Stand strong in the knowledge that the battle belongs to the Lord.
sentences.chinese: 既知道勝利必定屬於耶和華，我們自當剛強站穩。

sentences.english: People in low level, no kill until they stronger.
sentences.chinese: 低等生之徒，殺戮戒剛強。

sentences.english: I'm gonna be iron like a lion in Zion.
sentences.chinese: 我會像錫安城的獅子一樣剛強。

sentences.english: Sui Jianguo's artworks have always applied strong and precise expressive forms from sculpting.
sentences.chinese: 隋建國的作品始終運用剛強而精細的雕塑表現形式。

sentences.english: This kind of strong heart is really amazing.
sentences.chinese: 這種內心的剛強着實讓人歎服。

sentences.english: In overcoming the fear, you overcome the conditions and become a stronger person.
sentences.chinese: 在克服害怕的進程中，你會克服順境而成爲剛強的人。

sentences.english: Yu true feeling was father humane and full of love, inner increasingly strong.
sentences.chinese: 裕真感遭到父親仁厚和滿滿的愛，內心愈加剛強了。

sentences.english: To have a firm self-confidence is a first step toward a succesful negotiation.
sentences.chinese: 有了剛強的自年夜是走向會商告成的第一步。

definition: lit. able to support both heaven and earth/of indomitable spirit (idiom)
